import React, { useContext } from "react"; import IngredientList from "./IngredientList"; import { RecipeContext } from "./App"; export default function Recipe(props) { // Getting the function that we wanna use in this component const { handleRecipeDelete, handleRecipeSelect } = useContext(RecipeContext); const { id, name, cookTime, servings, instructions, ingredients } = props; return (

{name}

Cook Time: {cookTime}
Servings: {servings}
Instructions:
{instructions}
Ingredients:
); }
